mapper.select: select count(1) from ess_department where 1=1 and org_id=#{orgCd}
mapper.update: update ess_department set depCd=#{ment.depCd},depNm=#{ment.depNm}, depShortNm=#{ment.depShortNm},depDuty=#{ment.depDuty}, remark=#{ment.remark}, dispOrder=#{ment.dispOrder} where id=#{ment.id}
update ess_department set isDeleted = 1,deleteTime=now() where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT middle.dep_id middleDepId,middle.emp_id middleEmpId, dep.id as depId,yee.id as empId ,dep.depCd as depCd,dep.depNm as depNm,dep.depShortNm as depShortNm, dep.depDuty as depDuty,yee.id as id,yee.empCd as empCd,yee.empNm as empNm,yee.empNo as empNo,yee.duty as duty,yee.empGender as empGender,yee.phone as phone FROM ess_employee_dept middle LEFT JOIN ess_department dep ON middle.dep_id=dep.id LEFT JOIN ess_employee yee ON middle.emp_id=yee.id WHERE dep.id=#{id} AND (yee.isDeleted = 0 or yee.isDeleted is null)
